text: Aloe helenae is a species of plant in the genus Aloe. It is endemic to Madagascar. ==References== ==Sources== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Aloe helenae. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded 20 August 2007. title: Aloe helenae
